description: This trap is sent each time a threshold on a PM condition
on an Connect Guard flow is crossed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdCrossingAlert F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdIndex i 9999 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdInterval i 1 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdVariable o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdValueLo u 9999 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdValueHi u 9999 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdMonValue C 9999

description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the
f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdTable.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdIndex

description: The interval over which monitored value is
sampled and compared with the specified threshold.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdInterval

description: The object identifier of the particular variable to be
sampled.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdVariable

description: Lower 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdValueLo

description: Higher 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdValueHi

description: Monitored value corresponding to f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdVariable.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardFlowThresholdMonValue

description: This trap is sent each time a threshold on a PM condition
on an Connect Guard Tx SC is crossed.

event.Summary: Connect guard transmit SC threshold crossed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdCrossingAlert F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdIndex i 9999 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdInterval i 1 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdVariable o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdValueLo u 9999 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdValueHi u 9999 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdMonValue C 9999

description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the
f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdTable.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdIndex

description: The interval over which monitored value is
sampled and compared with the specified threshold.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdInterval

description: The object identifier of the particular variable to be
sampled.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdVariable

description: Lower 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdValueLo

description: Higher 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdValueHi

description: Monitored value corresponding to f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdVariable.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardTxSCThresholdMonValue

description: This trap is sent each time a threshold on a PM condition
on an Connect Guard Rx SC is crossed.

event.Summary: Connect guard receive SC threshold crossed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdCrossingAlert F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdIndex i 9999 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdInterval i 1 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdVariable o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdValueLo u 9999 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdValueHi u 9999 F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdMonValue C 9999

description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the
f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdTable.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdIndex

description: The interval over which monitored value is
sampled and compared with the specified threshold.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdInterval

description: The object identifier of the particular variable to be
sampled.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdVariable

description: Lower 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdValueLo

description: Higher 32 bits of the threshold value.

description: Monitored value corresponding to f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdVariable.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3ConnectGuardRxSCThresholdMonValue

description: This trap is sent each time secure state value changed.
This object specifies the secure state of this flow.
variables.name: F3-CONNECTGUARD-MIB::f3FlowSecureState
